title: ONGC Videsh to raise USD 800 million from 3 banks
description: The pricing of the loan could change depending on the level of interest from other participating banks, a second person said. At 120 basis points above the three-month SOFR rate, which is currently trading at about 5.30%, the loan could be priced at about 6.50%. One basis point is 0.01 percentage point.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
